Text:
Thanks! I'm hooked on this show... even though it's just another stupid reality show. It does have more guns than the others, though.

- Hubris
I love real guns, hence i love this show. I really hope there will be another season with cannons, modern mini guns, vintage Gatling's and RPG's... Go Gunation!
I just started watching this series thanks to torrents. Better than I expected - guns rock!
